PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Type
PresentationColumn.Description: Which area of the business this Volunteering Activity is for.

PresentationColumn.name: How Heard About
PresentationColumn.Description: How the Volunteer Heard about this Volunteering opportunity.

PresentationColumn.name: Motivation
PresentationColumn.Description: What motivated the Volunteer to apply for this Volunteering opportunity.

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Applied Date
PresentationColumn.Description:
The date that the application to volunteer was made
For Office, Other, and VF take from SRM Volunteer Roles List Applet (if null then, null)
For Events take from Vol Event applet
For Trading this field does not exist and so always null.

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity End Date
PresentationColumn.Description:
The date the Volunteering Activity finished
End Date for Volunteer Fundraising, Office, Other volunteers this is their Volunteering End Date. For Trading volunteers this is the Organisation Supporters End Date For Event volunteers this will be 18 months after the last Event start date (from Event header) This field will show null (blanks) if the volunteer is active.

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Estimated Hours
PresentationColumn.Description: How much time the Volunteer expects to be able to donate to CRUK.

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Estimated Hours Flag
PresentationColumn.Description: Indicates that the Estimated Hours field has been updated (if null then 'N', if not null then 'Y').

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Job Title
PresentationColumn.Description: The Role Title associated with this Volunteering Activity. Note: This is only available for Volunteering Activities of Type 'Trading'.

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Length of Service Range
PresentationColumn.Description: The time between the Start and End Date of a Volunteering Activity (or if still Active, between Start Date and Today). 1 - 2 years would be anything one year or more and less than two years. Note: If Start Date is null the the Created Date (date the record was created in Siebel) is used.

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Reason for Leaving
PresentationColumn.Description: The reason the Volunteer left this role. Note: This is not available for Volunteering Activities of Type 'Event'.

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Start Date
PresentationColumn.Description:
The date the Volunteer started this Volunteering Activity
For Volunteer Fundraising, Office, Other volunteers this is their Volunteering Start Date. For Trading volunteers this is the Organisation Supporters Start Date For Event volunteers this is the Event date (taken from Event header).

PresentationColumn.name: Volunteering Activity Status
PresentationColumn.Description: Indicates which stage the Volunteering Activity is at (Applied, Active, Lapsed)
